name: Untitled (Finger Painting)
description:
Hildegard Holland Watter, Untitled (Finger Painting), 2021, 7016 × 5096 px, PNG

This explosive, gestural finger painting was completed as a study during Hildy's arts education at a premiere, private preschool. Here, we see the artist experiment with the relationship between bold physical gesture and mark making. She makes broad, sweeping movements over a ground of smaller, clustered gestures that even preserve fingerprints in places. The colors of the piece, building up from pinks with blues that culminate in a deep purple, are a direct result of the physical engagement with the work.
